```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
###. Load data
```{r}
fish <- read_csv("data/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
```
###. Transform the fish data to only include the variables lakeID and length
```{r}
names(fish)
```

```{r}
fishlength <- select(fish, "lakeid", "length")
```
###. Filter fish data to include samples from lake BO
```{r}
lake_bo <- filter(fish, lakeid == "BO")
```
###. Calculate mean length of fish from lake BO
```{r}
mean(lake_bo$length)
```
